title: List of municipalities in Newfoundland and Labrador
summary: Newfoundland and Labrador is the ninth-most populous province in Canada, with 519,716 residents recorded in the 2016 Canadian Census, and is the seventh-largest in land area, with 370,514 km2 (143,056 sq mi).[1] Newfoundland and Labrador has 277 municipalities, including 3 cities, 269 towns, and 5 Inuit community governments, which cover only 2.2% of the province's land mass but are home to 89.6% of its population.[2]
